projects.name: Pizza Chat bot
projects.description: Embarking on my JavaScript journey. This is a project focusing on vanilla JavaScript to craft an interactive chat bot experience. This project revolves around core JavaScript functionalities without relying on libraries. Key features include a dynamic conversation flow, user prompts for pizza preferences, real-time responses, simple error handling and an engaging user interface.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A collaborative project that builds a user-friendly weather dashboard powered by a weather API. This initiative is a prime opportunity for pair programming, emphasizing collaborative development practices. Key requirements involve utilizing JavaScript's fetch() method to pull data from the API, presenting it in a specified format, and ensuring seamless responsiveness across different devices.

projects.name: Guess Who Game
projects.description: A project that brings the classic board game Guess Who into the digital sphere using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, this endeavour was a dynamic exploration of programming concepts. This venture involved an array of programming concepts, including DOM manipulation, event handling, function definitions, conditional statements, delayed execution, and the manipulation of objects and arrays.

projects.name: Music release
projects.description: A first React app for practicing fetching API and transferring the data to its children components using props. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. Components are provided; the focus is on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Yoga studio landing page
projects.description: Transform a UX student's design into a React-based multi-language landing page for a gym/fitness club. This project bridges the gap between design and development, showcasing the art of bringing visuals to life with code, incorporates multiple libraries such as Internationalisation library react-i18n and lottie files for animation.

projects.name: QR code generator
projects.description: Simple yet powerful, with the help of custom hook and qrcode library, user can generate a QR code with their own URL

projects.name: Gift generator - authentication projectz
projects.description: A React full-stack project that focuses on authenticating users and handling passwords. Create a User model using Mongoose with properties for your registered user, including storage for a user's access token. It also incorporates a RESTful API for error handling.

projects.name: Green Buddy - a marketplace for home-grown products
projects.description: Working with a team of 4, we built a full-stack website with React sharing and potentially exchanging home-made or home grown products.
